ExternalData.Subtitlesect: Amendment to the Montreal Protocol on Substances that Deplete the Ozone Layer

EIF.Label: Entry into force
EIF.Labeltext: 25 February 2002, in accordance with article 3(1)of the amendment.

TreatyText.Label: Text
TreatyText.Text: C.N.1231.1999.TREATIES-1 of 28 January 2000 and C.N.13.2004.TREATIES-2 of 8 January 2004 [Procès-verbal of rectification of the original of the amendment (French version)]; C.N.1003.2007.TREATIES-13of 16 October 2007 (proposal for corrections to the original text of the Amendment (Chinese version) and to the Certified True Copies and C.N.73.2008.TREATIES-2 of 6 February 2008 (Corrections).

TreatyNote.Text: At the Eleventh Meeting of the Parties to the Protocol, held in Beijing from 29 November to 3 December 1999, the Parties adopted, in accordance with the procedure laid down in article 9, paragraph 4 of the 1985 Vienna Convention for the Protection of the Ozone Layer, the Amendment to the Montreal Protocol as set out in Annex V to the report of the Eleventh Meeting of the Parties (Decision XI/5).
